summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3612, for the improvement of 49th Avenue Southwest and 48th Avenue Southwest, each from West Stevens Street to Admiral Way, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading under Ordinance No. 44657, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
